hasDitaContent.@value: Both clopidogrel and venlafaxine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  clopidogrel  and  venlafaxine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Clopidogrel causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Clopidogrel   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to decrease the efficacy of clopidogrel. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   decrease   the efficacy of   clopidogrel .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both clopidogrel and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  clopidogrel  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can clopidogrel ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Warfarin   causes   bleeding, as can   clopidogrel   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .
